articles.title: Research identifies potential genetic cause for MIS-C complication following COVID-19 infection - Science Daily
articles.description: New research findings have revealed an underlying genetic cause for why some children who have had COVID-19 infection develop Multisystem Inflammatory Syndrome in Children (MIS-C), a rare but potentially life-threatening disease.
